# Reading in Overall Data
```{r, echo=FALSE}

BRTotal <- read.csv("2019_20_BRTotal.csv")
# Changing a few variable names
BRTotal <- BRTotal %>% rename(Player = Ã¯..Player,
                              FG_P = FG.,
                              FT_P = FT.,
                              X3P_P = X3P.,
                              X2P_P = X2P.,
                              eFG_P = eFG.)
```

# PG Overall Stats
``` {r pg.overall}
#Finding the Stats for PGs
PG_Data <- BRTotal %>% filter(Pos == "PG") %>% drop_na()
# Adding the absolute value Differentials for each player from the medians
PG_Data <- PG_Data %>%
            mutate(Age.Diff = abs(PG_Data$Age - median(PG_Data$Age)),
                   G.Diff = abs(PG_Data$G - median(PG_Data$G)),
                   GS.Diff = abs(PG_Data$GS - median(PG_Data$GS)),
                   MP.Diff = abs(PG_Data$MP - median(PG_Data$MP)),
                   FG.Diff = abs(PG_Data$FG - median(PG_Data$FG)), 
                   FGA.Diff = abs(PG_Data$FGA - median(PG_Data$FGA)),
                   X3P.Diff = abs(PG_Data$X3P - median(PG_Data$X3P)),
                   X3PA.Diff = abs(PG_Data$X3PA- median(PG_Data$X3PA)),
                   X2P.Diff = abs(PG_Data$X2P - median(PG_Data$X2P)),
                   X2PA.Diff =abs(PG_Data$X2PA - median(PG_Data$X2PA)),
                   FT.Diff = abs(PG_Data$FT - median(PG_Data$FT)),
                   FTA.Diff =abs(PG_Data$FTA - median(PG_Data$FTA)),
                   TRB.Diff =abs(PG_Data$TRB - median(PG_Data$TRB)),
                   AST.Diff =abs(PG_Data$AST - median(PG_Data$AST)), 
                   STL.Diff =abs(PG_Data$STL - median(PG_Data$STL)), 
                   BLK.Diff =abs(PG_Data$BLK - median(PG_Data$BLK)),
                   TOV.Diff =abs(PG_Data$TOV - median(PG_Data$TOV)),
                   PF.Diff =abs(PG_Data$PF - median(PG_Data$PF)),
                   PTS.Diff =abs(PG_Data$PTS - median(PG_Data$PTS)),
                   FG_P.Diff =abs(PG_Data$FG_P - median(PG_Data$FG_P)),
                   FT_P.Diff =abs(PG_Data$FT_P - median(PG_Data$FT_P)),
                   X3P_P.Diff =abs(PG_Data$X3P_P - median(PG_Data$X3P_P)),
                   X2P_P.Diff =abs(PG_Data$X2P_P - median(PG_Data$X2P_P)),
                   eFG_P.Diff =abs(PG_Data$eFG_P - median(PG_Data$eFG_P)), 
                   ORB.Diff = abs(PG_Data$ORB - median(PG_Data$ORB)),
                   DRB.Diff = abs(PG_Data$DRB - median(PG_Data$DRB))
                   )
# Restructuring of Columns to make columns related to one another next to one another
PG_Data <- PG_Data %>%
  select(Player, Pos, Tm, Age, Age.Diff, G, G.Diff, GS, GS.Diff, MP, MP.Diff, FG, FG.Diff, FGA, FGA.Diff, X3P, X3P.Diff, X3PA, X3PA.Diff, X2P, X2P.Diff, X2PA, X2PA.Diff, FT, FT.Diff, FTA, FTA.Diff, TRB, TRB.Diff, AST, AST.Diff, STL, STL.Diff, BLK, BLK.Diff, TOV, TOV.Diff, PF, PF.Diff, PTS, PTS.Diff, FG_P, FG_P.Diff, FT_P, FT_P.Diff, X3P_P, X3P_P.Diff, X2P_P, X2P_P.Diff, eFG_P, eFG_P.Diff, ORB, ORB.Diff, DRB, DRB.Diff)

```

# PG Stats Per Game

```{r pg.g, echo=FALSE}
#Creating a dataframe with the data divided by Games Played
PG_Filter_G <- select(PG_Data,MP:DRB.Diff) 

PG_Stats_G <- PG_Filter_G %>% mutate_if(is.numeric, funs(./PG_Data$G))

PG_Data_G <- PG_Stats_G %>%
            mutate(MP.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$MP - median(PG_Stats_G$MP)),
                   FG.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$FG - median(PG_Stats_G$FG)), 
                   FGA.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$FGA - median(PG_Stats_G$FGA)),
                   X3P.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$X3P - median(PG_Stats_G$X3P)),
                   X3PA.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$X3PA- median(PG_Stats_G$X3PA)),
                   X2P.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$X2P - median(PG_Stats_G$X2P)),
                   X2PA.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$X2PA - median(PG_Stats_G$X2PA)),
                   FT.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$FT - median(PG_Stats_G$FT)),
                   FTA.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$FTA - median(PG_Stats_G$FTA)),
                   TRB.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$TRB - median(PG_Stats_G$TRB)),
                   AST.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$AST - median(PG_Stats_G$AST)), 
                   STL.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$STL - median(PG_Stats_G$STL)), 
                   BLK.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$BLK - median(PG_Stats_G$BLK)),
                   TOV.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$TOV - median(PG_Stats_G$TOV)),
                   PF.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$PF - median(PG_Stats_G$PF)),
                   PTS.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$PTS - median(PG_Stats_G$PTS)),
                   FG_P.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$FG_P - median(PG_Stats_G$FG_P)),
                   FT_P.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$FT_P - median(PG_Stats_G$FT_P)),
                   X3P_P.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$X3P_P - median(PG_Stats_G$X3P_P)),
                   X2P_P.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$X2P_P - median(PG_Stats_G$X2P_P)),
                   eFG_P.Diff =abs(PG_Stats_G$eFG_P - median(PG_Stats_G$eFG_P)), 
                   ORB.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$ORB - median(PG_Stats_G$ORB)),
                   DRB.Diff = abs(PG_Stats_G$DRB - median(PG_Stats_G$DRB))
                   )
# Restructuring of Columns to make columns related to one another next to one another
PG_Data_G <- mutate(PG_Data_G, 
                    Player = PG_Data$Player, 
                    Pos = PG_Data$Pos, 
                    Tm = PG_Data$Tm, 
                    Age = PG_Data$Age, 
                    Age.Diff = PG_Data$Age.Diff, 
                    G = PG_Data$G, 
                    G.Diff = PG_Data$G.Diff, 
                    GS = PG_Data$GS, 
                    GS.Diff = PG_Data$GS.Diff
                    )

PG_Data_G <- PG_Data_G %>%
  select(Player, Pos, Tm, Age, Age.Diff, G, G.Diff, GS, GS.Diff, MP, MP.Diff, FG, FG.Diff, FGA, FGA.Diff, X3P, X3P.Diff, X3PA, X3PA.Diff, X2P, X2P.Diff, X2PA, X2PA.Diff, FT, FT.Diff, FTA, FTA.Diff, TRB, TRB.Diff, AST, AST.Diff, STL, STL.Diff, BLK, BLK.Diff, TOV, TOV.Diff, PF, PF.Diff, PTS, PTS.Diff, FG_P, FG_P.Diff, FT_P, FT_P.Diff, X3P_P, X3P_P.Diff, X2P_P, X2P_P.Diff, eFG_P, eFG_P.Diff, ORB, ORB.Diff, DRB, DRB.Diff)
```
